activity_id.CMIP: CMIP core common experiments i.e. the DECK (Diagnostic, Evaluation and Characterization of Klima)

area_label.u: Unmasked i.e. all areas are included/sampled

drs_specs.MIP-DRS7: Data reference syntax (DRS) initially designed for use with CMIP7

historical.description: Simulation of the climate of the recent past (typically meaning 1850 to present-day)
historical.experiment: Simulation of the climate of the recent past (typically meaning 1850 to present-day)

piControl.description: Pre-industrial control simulation. Used to characterise natural variability and unforced behaviour.
piControl.experiment: Pre-industrial control simulation. Used to characterise natural variability and unforced behaviour.

piControl-spinup.description: Pre-industrial control spin-up simulation. Used to get the model into a state of approximate radiative equilibrium before starting the piControl simulation.
piControl-spinup.experiment: Pre-industrial control spin-up simulation. Used to get the model into a state of approximate radiative equilibrium before starting the piControl simulation.

mon.description: Monthly samples. Note that this means that the time interval between each sample is not constant for some calendars.

horizontal_label.hxy: Sampled in both the latitude and longitude directions. This if often referred to as 'gridded' data.

license.license_template: <license_id>; CMIP7 data produced by <institution_id> is licensed under a <license_type> License (<license_url>). Consult [TODO terms of use link] for terms of use governing CMIP7 output, including citation requirements and proper acknowledgment. The data producers and data providers make no warranty, either express or implied, including, but not limited to, warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. All liabilities arising from the supply of the information (including any liability arising in negligence) are excluded to the fullest extent permitted by law.

nominal_resolution.100-km: Should drs name be '100-km' or '100 km'? Having whitespace in drs name isn't ideal, but if this will only ever be used in global attributes, it won't technically break things. 100km nominal resolution.

product.model-output: Output from a model (i.e. numerical representation), in this context typically of the climate system or a component thereof.

realm.atmos: Dataset which applies (or mostly applies) to or is reported in the atmosphere part of the earth system.

DEMO.label: Context is wrong - label isn't really a name. Label for plots etc.
DEMO.label_extended: Context is wrong - extended label isn't really an extended name. Long label with full detail about the source

temporal_label.tavg: Time average i.e. the value for each time period is the average of the quantity over the time period.

variable_id.tas: Data reference syntax (DRS) initially designed for use with CMIP7

vertical_label.h2m: Sampled at a height of (approximately) 2m above the surface
